mapper.select: SELECT u.`name`, u.emp_title, u.emp_length, CAST(u.annual_inc as UNSIGNED INTEGER) as annual_inc, CAST(u.tot_coll_amt as UNSIGNED INTEGER) as tot_coll_amt, u.addr_state FROM loan_rd AS l, user AS u where l.member_id = u.member_id and l.loan_status = "Charged Off" AND u.emp_length IS NOT NULL AND u.addr_state != "unknown" AND u.emp_title IN ("经理", "司机", "护士", "店经理", "工程师", "管理者", "运营经理", "行政助理", "项目经理", "教师", "销售", "会计师", "总经理", "销售经理", "董事", "律师", "客户经理", "警官", "分析师", "技术员") AND l.tot_coll_amt != 0 LIMIT 0,30;

SELECT issue_d AS "申请时间", loan_amnt AS "贷款金额", term AS "贷款期数", int_rate AS "贷款利率", purpose AS "贷款原因", CASE application_type WHEN "INDIVIDUAL" THEN "个人" ELSE "联合" END AS "是否联合申请" FROM loan_rd where id = #{id};

SELECT emp_title as "职业", zip_code as "邮编", tot_coll_amt as "负债", annual_inc as "年收入", addr_state as "地址", emp_length as "工作年限", CASE home_ownership WHEN "MORTGAGE" THEN "有房有贷" WHEN "OWN" THEN "有房无贷" ELSE "租赁" END as "房产情况" , CASE pub_rec WHEN 0 THEN "无" ELSE "有" END as "不良信贷记录" FROM loan_rd WHERE id = #{id};
SELECT id, issue_d, loan_amnt, term, CASE loan_status WHEN "Current" THEN "按期" WHEN "Fully Paid" THEN "按期" ELSE "逾期" END AS loan_status FROM loan_rd WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND id != #{id};
